= Usage =

LODPeas requires two input files in order run i.e. an input quad file and a redirects file.  For example input files see [http://swse.deri.org/dyldo/data/ here].  Specifically see [http://swse.deri.org/dyldo/data/2012-05-06/data.nq.gz here] for example input file and [http://swse.deri.org/dyldo/data/2012-05-06/redirects.nx.gz here] for example redirects file.

The latest jar can be found [http://code.google.com/p/voidstats/downloads/list here].
